title: Red Wool
desc:
Post 1961
- When stood on, all of your basic color cards will be converted to <:red:1106234051129507932> cards.
- The next time a basic color card is played, all currently placed Wool cards will be converted to that color of Wool.
- This card is of the Natural subtype.
- This card takes 2 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card cannot be drawn, and is instead created when a <:red:1106234051129507932> card is played and any Wool card is present.
